speaker: HOST
text: What wouldst thou have, boor? What, thickskin?

speaker: HOST
text: Speak, breathe, discuss; brief, short, quick,

speaker: HOST
text: snap.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: Marry, sir, I come to speak with Sir John Falstaff

speaker: SIMPLE
text: from Master Slender.

speaker: HOST
text: There’s his chamber, his house, his castle, his

speaker: HOST
text: standing-bed and truckle-bed. ’Tis painted about

speaker: HOST
text: with the story of the Prodigal, fresh and new. Go,

speaker: HOST
text: knock and call. He’ll speak like an Anthropophaginian

speaker: HOST
text: unto thee. Knock, I say.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: There’s an old woman, a fat woman, gone up

speaker: SIMPLE
text: into his chamber. I’ll be so bold as stay, sir, till she

speaker: SIMPLE
text: come down. I come to speak with her, indeed.

speaker: HOST
text: Ha? A fat woman? The knight may be robbed.

speaker: HOST
text: I’ll call.—Bully knight! Bully Sir John! Speak from

speaker: HOST
text: thy lungs military. Art thou there? It is thine Host,

speaker: HOST
text: thine Ephesian, calls.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: How now, mine Host?

speaker: HOST
text: Here’s a Bohemian Tartar tarries the coming

speaker: HOST
text: down of thy fat woman. Let her descend, bully, let

speaker: HOST
text: her descend. My chambers are honorable. Fie! Privacy?

speaker: HOST
text: Fie!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: There was, mine Host, an old fat woman

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: even now with me, but she’s gone.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: Pray you, sir, was ’t not the wise woman of

speaker: SIMPLE
text: Brentford?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ay, marry, was it, mussel-shell. What would

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you with her?

speaker: SIMPLE
text: My master, sir, my Master Slender, sent to her,

speaker: SIMPLE
text: seeing her go through the streets, to know, sir,

speaker: SIMPLE
text: whether one Nym, sir, that beguiled him of a chain,

speaker: SIMPLE
text: had the chain or no.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I spake with the old woman about it.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: And what says she, I pray, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Marry, she says that the very same man that

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: beguiled Master Slender of his chain cozened him

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of it.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: I would I could have spoken with the woman

speaker: SIMPLE
text: herself. I had other things to have spoken with her

speaker: SIMPLE
text: too from him.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: What are they? Let us know.

speaker: HOST
text: Ay, come. Quick!

speaker: SIMPLE
text: I may not conceal them, sir.

speaker: HOST
text: Conceal them, or thou diest.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: Why, sir, they were nothing but about Mistress

speaker: SIMPLE
text: Anne Page, to know if it were my master’s fortune

speaker: SIMPLE
text: to have her or no.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: ’Tis; ’tis his fortune.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: What, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: To have her or no. Go. Say the woman told

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: me so.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: May I be bold to say so, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ay, sir; like who more bold.

speaker: SIMPLE
text: I thank your Worship. I shall make my master

speaker: SIMPLE
text: glad with these tidings.

speaker: HOST
text: Thou art clerkly, thou art clerkly, Sir John. Was

speaker: HOST
text: there a wise woman with thee?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ay, that there was, mine Host, one that hath

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: taught me more wit than ever I learned before in

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my life. And I paid nothing for it neither, but was

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: paid for my learning.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Out, alas, sir, cozenage, mere

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: cozenage!

speaker: HOST
text: Where be my horses? Speak well of them,

speaker: HOST
text: varletto.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Run away with the cozeners. For so soon as

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: I came beyond Eton, they threw me off from behind

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: one of them in a slough of mire, and set

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: spurs, and away, like three German devils, three

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Doctor Faustuses.

speaker: HOST
text: They are gone but to meet the Duke, villain. Do

speaker: HOST
text: not say they be fled. Germans are honest men.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Where is mine Host?

speaker: HOST
text: What is the matter, sir?

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Have a care of your entertainments. There is

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: a friend of mine come to town tells me there is

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: three cozen-Germans that has cozened all the

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: hosts of Readings, of Maidenhead, of Colnbrook,

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: of horses and money. I tell you for good will, look

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: you. You are wise, and full of gibes and vlouting-stocks,

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: and ’tis not convenient you should be cozened.

speaker:
SIR
               
              HUGH
text: Fare you well.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Vere is mine Host de Jarteer?

speaker: HOST
text: Here, Master Doctor, in perplexity and doubtful

speaker: HOST
text: dilemma.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: I cannot tell vat is dat. But it is tell-a me

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: dat you make grand preparation for a duke de

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Jamanie. By my trot, dere is no duke that the court

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: is know to come. I tell you for good will. Adieu.

speaker: HOST
text: Hue and cry, villain, go!—Assist

speaker: HOST
text: me, knight. I am undone.—Fly, run; hue and cry,

speaker: HOST
text: villain! I am undone.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I would all the world might be cozened, for I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: have been cozened and beaten too. If it should

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: come to the ear of the court how I have been transformed,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and how my transformation hath been

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: washed and cudgeled, they would melt me out of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my fat drop by drop, and liquor fishermen’s boots

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: with me. I warrant they would whip me with their

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: fine wits till I were as crestfallen as a dried pear. I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: never prospered since I forswore myself at

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: primero. Well, if my wind were but long enough, I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: would repent.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Now, whence come you?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: From the two parties, forsooth.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: The devil take one party, and his dam the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: other, and so they shall be both bestowed. I have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: suffered more for their sakes, more than the villainous

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: inconstancy of man’s disposition is able to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: bear.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: And have not they suffered? Yes, I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: warrant, speciously one of them. Mistress Ford,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: good heart, is beaten black and blue that you cannot

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: see a white spot about her.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: What tell’st thou me of black and blue? I was

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: beaten myself into all the colors of the rainbow,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and I was like to be apprehended for the witch of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Brentford. But that my admirable dexterity of wit,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my counterfeiting the action of an old woman, delivered

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: me, the knave constable had set me i’ th’

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: stocks, i’ th’ common stocks, for a witch.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Sir, let me speak with you in your

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: chamber. You shall hear how things go, and, I warrant,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: to your content. Here is a letter will say

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text:
somewhat.
                 
                She
                 
                gives
                 
                him
                 
                a
                 
                paper
                .
               Good hearts,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: what ado here is to bring you together! Sure, one

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: of you does not serve heaven well, that you are so

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: crossed.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come up into my chamber.
